fudge.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a soft creamy brown sweet food
fudge.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to avoid giving exact details or a clear answer about something
fudge.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: He tried to fudge the issue by saying that he did not want to specify periods.
fudge.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to change important figures or facts to deceive people
fudge.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: Sibley has been fudging his data for years now.
